text: Viktor Ivanovich Merezhko (; 28 July 1937 – 30 January 2022) was a Russian director, producer, playwright, actor, screenwriter, and television presenter. He was awarded the honorary title People's Artist of the Russian Federation in 2014.Указ Президента Российской Федерации от 14 августа 2014 года № 568 «О награждении государственными наградами Российской Федерации» His best known works were Family Relations, Flights in Dreams and Reality and Assia and the Hen with the Golden Eggs. Merezhko was born in Rostov Oblast, then-Soviet Union.
